languages.text: "К счастью, потери среди офицеров на мостике незначительны — докладывают лишь о нескольких погибших, которым уже нашли замену".
"Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."
languages.original_text: "К счастью, потери среди офицеров на мостике незначительны — докладывают лишь о нескольких погибших, которым уже нашли замену".

traits.locale_text: "Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."
"Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."
"Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."
"Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."
"Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."

languages.text: “幸运的是，舰桥仅仅遭受了轻微的损失。报告中只提到了少量伤亡，而阵亡军官也已经找到了后备人选。”
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."

traits.locale_text: “幸运的是，舰桥仅仅遭受了轻微的损失。报告中只提到了少量伤亡，而阵亡军官也已经找到了后备人选。”

languages.text: «Afortunadamente, el puente solo ha sufrido daños menores. Los informes solo mencionan unas pocas bajas que ya han sido reemplazadas».
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."

traits.locale_text: «Afortunadamente, el puente solo ha sufrido daños menores. Los informes solo mencionan unas pocas bajas que ya han sido reemplazadas».

languages.text: "Glücklicherweise erlitt die Brücke nur geringe Verluste — in den Berichten ist nur von einigen wenigen Verletzten die Rede, die bereits ersetzt wurden."
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."

traits.locale_text: "Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."

languages.text: « Fort heureusement, le pont n'a subi que des pertes limitées. Les rapports font état de quelques victimes seulement, et elles ont déjà été remplacées. »
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."

traits.locale_text: « Fort heureusement, le pont n'a subi que des pertes limitées. Les rapports font état de quelques victimes seulement, et elles ont déjà été remplacées. »

languages.text: 「ブリッジの被害が軽く済んでツイていましたね…報告にある死傷者は数名のみで、すでに代わりを向かわせました」
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."

traits.locale_text: 「ブリッジの被害が軽く済んでツイていましたね…報告にある死傷者は数名のみで、すでに代わりを向かわせました」

languages.text: "Neyse ki köprü yalnızca hafif hasar aldı. Raporlarda az sayıda kayıp verildiği belirtiliyor ki onların yerine de yenileri alındı."
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, the bridge suffered only minor losses — the reports mention only a few casualties that have already been replaced."
